summary: 1998 AUDI A4 1.8 LITER QUATTRO.  EXPERIENCING REDUCED BRAKING CAPABILITY WHEN BRAKES ARE WET.  THIS IS THE EXACT COMPLAINT BEING INVESTIGATED IN NHTSA ACTION NUMBER PE00016.  THE BRAKES WORK FINE WHEN DRY, BUT EFFECTIVENESS IS GREATLY REDUCED WHEN WET, AND STOPPING DISTANCE INCREASES SIGNIFICANTLY, CAUSING A SAFETY CONCERN.   *NLM
